description: This file declares the ILocalStore interface which provides methods for managing a local store, including opening, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer type for this interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: Interface class defining the contract for local store operations, including methods for opening, creating, limiting, retrieving, removing, and adding entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the store with the given name.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in the specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries from the specified start position up to maxCount in the given table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Fetches a list of entries starting from a specified position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from start to end indices in the specified table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to the specified table.
